text:
Sapar Jumakadyrovich Isakov (; born July 29, 1977) is a Kyrgyz politician. He was Prime Minister from 26 August 2017 to 19 April 2018. He was chief of staff for President Almazbek Atambayev.
On 19 April 2018 the President of Kyrgyzstan Sooronbay Jeenbekov fired Isakov and the government following a vote of no confidence.
Isakov was arrested June 5, 2018 for corruption charges.
In August 2019, Isakov was hospitalized due to a stroke.
